description:
Once https://review.openstack.org/40909 is merged, move RawTGZImage to a common library, so others can re-use it.

Also consider moving UpdateGlanceImage:

https://review.openstack.org/41651
title: refactor: move RawTGZImage and UpdateGlanceImage to common

    xenapi: refactor: move UpdateGlanceImage to common
    
    During the review of https://review.openstack.org/41651 it was
    recommended to move UpdateGlanceImage to a common library. A bug was
    filed to deal with the refactors. This change fixes the first part.
    
    Fixes bug 1220596
